    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the calendar with the current date and draws the calendar view.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object.
      resourceBundle - The resources specific to this controller.

    • refreshCalendar

      public void refreshCalendar()

    • addActivity

      public void addActivity(CalendarActivity calendarActivity, Session session)
      Adds a new activity to the calendar and redraws the calendar view.
      Parameters:
      calendarActivity - The CalendarActivity to be added.

    • drawCalendar

      public void drawCalendar()
      Draws the calendar view based on the currently focused date. Retrieves activities for each day and displays them on the calendar.

    • getActivitiesOnDate

      public List<CalendarActivity> getActivitiesOnDate(LocalDate date)
      Retrieves activities scheduled on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which activities are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of CalendarActivity objects scheduled for the given date.
